name: snowflake-chrome-extension
description: Add a panel to DevTools to show Snowplow analytics beacon information.

scripts.start: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && ln -s ../manifest.json ../res/sa-logo.png ../res/snowflake.png ../res/snowflake-16.png ../res/snowflake-48.png ../res/snowflake-128.png ../res/sp.js ../src/devtools.html ../src/panel.html ../src/style.css ../src/popup.html ../src/options.html dist/ && webpack -p --watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json res/sa-logo.png res/snowflake.png res/snowflake-16.png res/snowflake-48.png res/snowflake-128.png res/sp.js src/devtools.html src/panel.html src/style.css src/popup.html src/options.html dist/ && webpack -p
scripts.zip: npm run build && zip -r snowflake-chrome-extension.zip dist/

author: Snowflake Analytics
